main.name: Rahul Sahastrabuddhe
main.bio: Hi!! I am a graduate student pursuing my MS in Computer Science at University of Texas at Dallas. I am actively looking for Software Engineer roles starting from December 2022.
main.background: I have 3 years of full time Software Engineering experience with 3 months of Internship experience.
main.contactmessage: Want to hire me. Please contact below it works perfectly.
